description: Try our easy to follow Orange Juice Bircher With Apple, Cinnamon And Walnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Muesli, granola & porridge,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple
name: Orange Juice Bircher With Apple, Cinnamon And Walnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.66 cup The Juice Squad Orange Pulp Free Juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place the oats and raisins in a bowl and pour over orange juice. Leave in fridge for an hour or otherwise prepare the night before for your breakfast.
When ready to eat, top with yoghurt, apple slices, cinnamon and walnuts to serve.
